beFirstToStart: Be the first to start a discussion
pageDescription: Browse investor discussions, ask questions, and share insights about global markets.
forumDescription: Discuss investment strategies, share experiences, and analyze markets with the community
needSignInToCreate: You need to be signed in to create a discussion.
rateLimitCreateExceeded: Rate limit exceeded. Please wait before creating another discussion.

form.titleHelp: Title must be at least 10 characters.
form.tagsHelp: Add tags to help others find your topic
form.symbolHelp: Link the discussion to a specific asset
form.contentHelp: Content must be at least 50 characters. Markdown supported: **bold**, *italic*, `code`, etc.

validation.titleMin: Title must be at least 10 characters
validation.contentMin: Content must be at least 50 characters
validation.profanity: Your message contains inappropriate language. Please revise your content.
validation.phoneNumber: Phone numbers are not allowed in forum posts. Please remove any phone numbers.
validation.offensive: Your message contains offensive content. Please be respectful.
validation.generic: Your message violates our community guidelines. Please review and revise.
validation.multipleViolations: Your message contains multiple violations. Please review and revise your content.
